text: It works with gifs, just not animated gifs yet
ah okay. That's what I meant :wink:
There is a page field in the new custom modules, would be great if we could get a blog post field as well.
YES! 100% agree on that, would make creating a "recommended posts" or "featured posts" module very easy
We also have a "recommended content" module that's in beta and uses contact data (via some machine learning) to identify and surface related posts that may be interesting for a visitor.
I tried using that on our blog roll and it kept recommending the same article (our worst performing article) too everyone along with others so we stopped using it about 3 weeks ago.
Hm. That's good feedback. I'll pass it along to the team working on it.
Just heard back. We're working on the algorithm behind it. Can't promise a timeline when it will be updated right now, but just wanted you to know it's something we're working on.
